This page documents the people "in charge" of Ubuntu California and the people who have administrative access to the various registrations (Web 2.0 accounts, discussion media, etc.)  the LoCo team uses. If you're given administrative access to one of the below registrations, or the LoCo decides to create a new one somewhere, please document it below.
